name: vega-view-transforms

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-view-transforms.js -c -m -o build/vega-view-transforms.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g vega-dataflow:vega,vega-scenegraph:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega.transforms -o build/vega-view-transforms.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-view-transforms.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-view-transforms.js build/vega-view-transforms.min.js

readme:
# vega-view-transforms

View-specific transforms for Vega dataflows.

This module provides the following Vega data transform:

- [**Identifier**](https://vega.github.io/vega/docs/transforms/identifier/) [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-view-transforms/blob/master/src/Identifier.js "Source")

And also provides the following internal transforms:

- **Bound** [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-view-transforms/blob/master/src/Bound.js "Source")
- **Mark** [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-view-transforms/blob/master/src/Mark.js "Source")
- **Overlap** [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-view-transforms/blob/master/src/Overlap.js "Source")
- **Render** [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-view-transforms/blob/master/src/Render.js "Source")
- **ViewLayout** [<>](https://github.com/vega/vega-view-transforms/blob/master/src/ViewLayout.js "Source")
